23. Which compilers can be used to build VisIt?

The following compilers can be used to build VisIt on the listed platforms, though this is not an exhaustive list and newer versions of these compilers often work.

Platform Compiler
Linux g++ 4.4 or later, g++ 4.8 or later when building FastBit
Windows XP,Vista,7 Microsoft Visual Studio 2012
MacOS X 10.8.5 g++ 4.2 or later
MacOS X 10.11.6 LLVM 7.3.0 (clang-703.0.29)
